lg.By signing up you agree with our Terms a: Mu kuggulawo akaawunti, okkaanya n’enkola zaffe wamu n’obukwakkulizo
lg.To learn more about how we use your data: Okumanya ebisingawo ku ngeri gye tukozesaamu ebikukwatako, Soma ku nkola zaffe ez'enkiso.
lg.The app is free, secure, and helps conne: Apu ya bwereere, nnungi, era ekuyamba okukuyunga ku bintu eby’omugaso okumanyiira n'okugumiira.
lg.Receive alerts about your health in time: Funa okumanyisibwa ku bulamu bwo mu budde
lg.Quickly track your medication on the app: Londoola mu bwangu eby’obujjanjabi byo ng’okozesa apu
lg.Before the seizure, did you have an Aura: Nga tonnaba kwesika, wawulira embeera etali ya bulijjo?
lg.An aura is unusual feeling, experience,: Embeera y'okuva mu bulamu bwo obwa bulijjo kwe kwewulira obubi, okuyita mu mbeera oba okutaataaganyisibwa mu butoffaali bw'omubiri ekiraga okujja kw'okwesika .
lg.What kind of aura was it?: Embeera etali ya bulijjo yali ya ngeri ki?
lg.The sensation of being in a familiar pla: Empulira y'okubeera mu kifo ky'omanyi oba okuyita mu mbeera efaananira ddala eyo.
lg.Tingling Sensation: Embeera y'obusimu bw'omu mubiri okusindika obubaka obusukka ku bwa bulijjo.
lg.An experience of being unfamiliar with a: Embeera y'okubeera nga tojjukira muntu oba ekifo oba embeera mu butuufu gye wali omanyi obulungi ennyo.
lg.You can select up to six(6) feelings: Osobola okulonda okutuuka ku mbeera mukaaga (6)
lg.It seems you have been feeling positive: Kirabika obadde owulira obulungi gye buvuddeko
lg.It seems you have been feeling distresse: Kirabika obadde owulira ennaku gye buvuddeko
lg.It seems you have been feeling good late: Kirabika obadde owulira obulungi gye buvuddeko
lg.It seems you have been feeling envious l: Kirabika obadde owulira obuggya gye buvuddeko
lg.It seems you have been feeling abit nega: Kirabika obadde towulira bulungi gye buvuddeko
lg.Oh no! Seems you have not been treated w: Oh nedda! Kirabika tojjanjabibiddwa bulungi gye buvuddeko
lg.Doing acts of service which can be descr: Okukola ekikolwa ky'obuweereza ekisobola okunnyonnyolwa ng'okukolera omuntu ekintu ky'omanyi kye bayinza okwagala ekisobola okubaleetako embeera ennungi wamu n'okubeera obulungi.
lg.Pick one service goal to complete in the: Londa ekigendererwa ky'obuweereza kimu eky'okumaliriza mu nnaku ntono eziddako. Okuyamba omuntu oba ekibinja kisobola okuganyulwa mu kubeera kwo obulungi.
lg.Consider doing the service act without o: Faayo okukola obuweereza ebiseera ebimu ng'abantu abalala tebamanyi
lg.Carry groceries for an elder or mother w: Situlirako omukadde ebintu eby'okukozesa awaka oba maama ayina abaana abato
lg.Volunteer at your church/mosque: Kola emirimu gy'obwannakyewa ku kkanisa yo/omuzikiti
lg.Help someone with their school or home t: Yambako omuntu n'emirimu gy'oku ssomero oba egy'awaka
lg.Wash up the plates and cups after a meal: Yoza amasowaani n'ebikopo oluvannyuma lw'okulya emmere nga togambiddwa
lg.Wash/iron your parents or siblings’ clot: Yoza/golola engoye z'abazadde bo oba baganda bo
lg.Empty the dustbin into the designated wa: Yiwayo kasasiro mu bifo ebiyiirwamu kasasiro okuva mu kintu mw'akungaanyizibwa
lg.Manage your triggers: Kola ku bintu byo ebireeta embeera
lg.Learning your triggers and avoiding them: Okumanya ebintu ebireeta embeera yo n'okubyewala kiyinza okwetaaga obugumiikiriza, okwefumiitiriza ku by'olowooza okusobola okuzuula n'okuyiga engeri z'okubyewala n'okubikolako. Ebimu ku bireeta embeera eno mulimu;
lg.Particular food items such as - tea, co: Ebika by'emmere ebimu gamba nga; amajaani, kaawa, kyokuleeti, ssukaali, switi, eby'okunywa ebitatamiiza, omunnyo ogusukkiridde, n'ebirungo.
lg.Imbalance of substances (electrolytes) t: Obutenkanankana bw'ebintu mu mubiri (obusannyalaze) ebikuuma amazzi munda oba wabweru w'omubiri era nga bya mugaso ku binwa n'obusimu bw'omubiri.
Obulwadde oba ebbugumu eringi mu mubiri
lg.Hormonal changes/Menstruation: Enkyukakyuka mu busimu bw'omubiri/Okugenda mu nsonga
lg.Very warm weather, hot baths or showers,: Obudde obw'ebbugumu, okunaaba amazzi agookya, naddala nga waliwo enkyukakyuka ey'embagirawo mu bbugumu
Okunywa omwenge oba ebiragalalagala ebitakkirizibwa mu mateeka
lg.Taking your medications as prescribed, w: Okumira eddagala nga bw'olagirwa, ewatali kubuukamu ddoozi y'engeri ey'enkomeredde ey'okukendeeza emikisa gy'okwesika. Eddagala eritangira okwesika terikola bulungi ng'olimira obuukamu. Lyetaaga okumira buli lunaku nga tobuuseemu ddoozi.
lg.Taking good care of your physical health: Okwefaako obulungi ku mubiri nakyo kya mugaso. Obuteebaka kimala, obutalya bulungi wamu n'obutanywa kuviirako okwesika eri abantu abamu. Noolwekyo, kyamugaso nnyo okulya buli lw'oteekeddwa okulya awatali kubuukamu era gezaako okwewala emmere ennyingi erimu kafeyini, okuwoomerera okungi, omunnyo oba ebirungo. Wummula ekimala ate buli lunaku era okole dduyiro mpola. Bwoba teweewuulira bulungi (olwadde) Gezaako okufuna obujjanjabi mangu ddala nga bwe kisoboka. Ebbugumu ly'omubiri gwo bwe liba waggulu osobola okukendeeza omuliro ogwo n'eddagala erikendeeza omuliro, nga panado nga bw'onoonya obujjanjabi obulala
lg.Flashing lights can also trigger seizure: Amataala agamyansa nago gasobola okuvaako okwesika mu bantu abamu abayina ensimbu, abantu ng'abo bagambibwa okubeera n'obulwadde bw'ensimbu obuva ku kitangaala.
lg.Some specific examples of situations or: Ebyokulabirako ebimu eby'enkukunala eby'embeera oba ebintu ebisobola okuviirako okwesika mu bantu abayina obulwadde bw'ensimbu obuva ku kitangaala mulimu:
lg.In order to reduce the likelihood of hav: Mu kaweefube w'okukendeeza okubeera n'embeera ey'okwesika olw'embeera zino oba ebituukawo ebirala, kyamugaso okukola kyonna ky'osobola okwegobako ebireeta embeera y'okwesika ng'ogoberera ebisikiriza. Obubagulizo obumu bw'oyinza okukozesa mulimu okujjukira ekigamba "tulo
lg.S- Screen smart, be screen smart by empl: Ku ntimbe, fuba obuteesembereza ntimbe ng'oteekawo enkola ennuŋŋamu nga:
lg.Watching TV and playing video games in a: Okulaba TV n'okuzannya obuzannyo bwa vidiyo mu bisenge ebitaliimu nnyo kitangaala era ne mu buwanvu obulungi obutakukosa okuva ku lutimbe (waakiri mmita bbiri n'ekitundu (2.5) okuva ku TV, n'ekitundu kya mmita (0.5) okuva ku ndabirwamu ya kompyuta.
lg.Limiting the time spent in front of the: Okukendeeza ku budde bw'omala ku TV, kompyuta, oba ku byuma ebikozesebwa mu ngalo  (essimusseereza/taabuleeti) oba okukendeeza by'ozannyira ku kompyuta n'emizannyo gya vidiyo.
lg.Using flicker-free monitors (LCD or flat: Okukozesa entimbe ezikendeeza ekitangaala mu liiso (LCD oba eby'olutimbe oluseeteevu)
lg.Reducing the brightness on screen monito: Okukendeeza ku kitangaala ekiva ku lutimbe lwa kompyuta.
lg.Using a remote control instead of walkin: Okukozesa limooti okukyusa omukutu mu kifo ky'okutambula ogende ku TV.
lg.Adjusting Internet settings to control m: Okukyusa enteekateeka y'omutimbagano okusobola okufuga ebifaananyi ebitambula.
lg.L- Lifestyle. Adopt a healthy lifestyle: Ku ntambuza y'obulamu bwo. Kyusa entambuza y'obulamu bwo nga weebaka ekimala, okukendeeza mu kwenyigira mu bintu ebitaataaganya endowooza yo n'okukendeeza ku kukozesa ebintu ebitamiiza nga omwenge.
lg.E-Eyes. Whenever possible when outdoors,: Ku maaso. We kisobokera wonna nga oli wabweru, yambala ggaalubindi z'omusana okusobola okutangira amaaso go okuva ku kitangaala.
lg.E-Entertainment. Choose sources of enter: Mu byamasanyu. Londa ebyamasanyu ebisobola okubeera n'ebimyanso by'ekitangaala ebitono. Oyinza okwagala okwewala: Ebifo ebisanyukirwamu ekiro, okukuba ebiriroliro oba ebivvulu
lg.P-Preparedness. Always be prepared with: Ku kweteekateeka. Bulijjo beeranga mweteefuteefu n'amagezi agakwata ku bikuviirako era onoonye engeri z'okwewalamu nga bwe kisoboka. Mu mbeera ezimu, okwesika kwo okuva ku bifaananyi kuyinza okugobererwa obubonero obutali bwa bulijjo nga okuziyira, ekifu ku maaso oba okwekwata kw'ebinywa
lg.If you notice any of these or other warn: Singa ofuna akamu ku bubonero buno oba okubagulizibwako okulala kwonna, bikka eriiso lyo erimu era okyuse omutwe gwo amangu ddala okuva eri ekintu ekikuleetera obuzibu. Bw'oba olaba TV oba ng'ozannya obuzannyo bwa vidiyo, bikkako eriiso limu era otambule okuvaawo.
lg.Sometimes extreme emotions, like excitem: Ebiseera ebimu embeera ezisukkiridde ennyo, nga, okukyamuukirira, okutya, oba ekiwuubaalo bisobola okuviirako okwesika.  Fuba nnyo okulaba engeri situleesi wo  gy'aleetamu emirundi gy'okwesika.  Abantu abamu bagamba nti ebibinja ebiyamba oba okwogera n'omuntu gwe weesiga mu famire oba mukwano gwo kusobola okukuyamba okukwasaganya embeera eno, okulongoosa embeera z'obulamu era nga kisoboka okukendeeza emirundi gy'okwesika
lg.Avoid excess use of alcohol and avoid il: Weewale okukozesa omwenge omungi n'ebiragalalagala ebitamiiza kuba biyinza okuviirako okwesika.
lg.Some women with epilepsy may have seizur: Abakyala abamu abalina obulwadde bw'ensimbu buyinza okuba n'okwesika okwekuusa ku butoffaali, okugeza okubeerawo ennyo mu kiseera ky'okugenda mu nsonga. Obulwadde bw'ensimbu buno bweyolekera ennyo mu kiseera ky'okuba mu nsonga. Kikubirizibwa okwogera n'omusawo wo ku nsonga eno, .kiyambe eddagala erimu okukyusibwa  oba okugattibwako nga tonnagenda mu nsonga za kikyala okukendeeza emirundi gy'okwesika
lg.Sometimes, people experience seizures th: Ebiseera ebimu, abantu bafuna okwesika okwekuusa ku nkyukakyuka mu bbugumu, okugeza singa omu anaaba amazzi agookya oba okunaaba. Gezaako okumanya ebintu ebiviirako embeera eno era oyogere n'omusawo wo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu kino.
lg.Overall, try to avoid extremes. ‘Stay in: Okutwaliza awamu, gezaako okwewala ebintu ebisukkiridde. 'Beera mu makkati', weewale okukoowa ennyo, enjala, okulinnyisa embeera yonna gy'owulira. Noonya engeri gy'oyinza okutebenkeezaamu engeri gy'owulira ng'osobodde. Okwesigamu mu mubiri ne mu birowoozo kijja kuzaala ebibala bingi.
lg.Positive affirmations are positive state: Ebikolwa ebirungi ze ngeri ennungi ze weeyogerako okusobola okukuyamba okujjukira ebirabo byo, obukugu, n'emikisa. Londa ebintu 3 ebyokwogera ku buli kumakya n'ekiro okumala ennaku  3
lg.This is a very easy and fun way to chang: Eno y'engeri ennyangu ennyo okukyusa ekifaananyi kyo! Singa obeera n'obuzibu olina obuzibu mu kulowooza ku birowoozo ebirungi ku ggwe, buuza ebintu.
lg.I love who I am and can not wait to see: Njagala ki kyendi era sisobola kulinda kulaba ki kye nfuuka
lg.Making friends or getting to know other: Okukola emikwano oba okumanya abantu abalala kya mugaso nnyo mu kubeera obulungi. Ebiseera ebimu kizibu okukola enkwatagana zino olw'ensonga nti olina ensonyi, tetumanyi balala  oba tutya  okutwesonyiwa, okutuyisa obubi oba okutusekerera.
lg.Try to build your social community in sm: Gezaako okuzimba enkolaganayo n'abantu mu mitendera emitonotono mu kiseera. Londa ekiruubirirwa kimu eky'okukolaganira awamu n'okugezaako okukola emirimu egyenyigiramu abantu abangi mu nnaku entono eziddako.
lg.Spend time with a special family member,: Malako obudde ne bammemba ba famire yo ab'omuwendo, omukwano, gw'osoma naye, oba omuntu okuva ku kkanisa/omuzikiti oba okuva mu kibinja ky'abantu b'osaba nabo. Ebiseera ebimu osobola okusisinkana abantu okuva mu bibiina by'abalwadde b'ensimbu, ng'okuyita mu bibiina by'abalwadde b'ensimbu mu Uganda oba aba Purple bench.
lg.The race may be long but you are stronge: Emisinde giyinza okuba emiwanvu wabula oli mugumu okusinga bwe weewaana
lg.Compare yourself to who you were yesterd: Weegeraageranye ku bwe wabadde eggulo, si ku muntu mulala olwaleero
lg.So many people are afraid of failure, wh: Abantu bangi nnyo batya okulemererwa, ddi era ki kye balina okweraliikiria kwe kwejjusa
lg.The view is beautiful from the top, but: Gy'otunudde walabika bulungi ng'oli waggulu, wabula waliwo obulungi ng'olinnye waggulu. Tokibuusa maaso.
lg.Discipline will take you places where mo: Empisa zijja kukutwala mu bifo amaanyi we gatasobola.
lg.You get tested the most when you're abou: Ofuna okusoomoozebwa kungi bw'obeera ng'onaatera okutuuka ku mutendera omuggya, toggwamu maanyi.
lg.What we fear doing is usually what we ne: Kye tusinga okutya okukola kye tusinga okwetaaga okukola emirundi egiwera.
lg.If you cannot do great things, do small: Bw'oba tosobola kukola bintu bya nnaggwano, kola ebitono mu ngeri ey'amaanyi
lg.Life and nature show us you have to get: Obulamu n'embeera bitulaga nti olina okuyita mu mbeera enzibu okusobola okutuuka mu mbeera eyeeyagaza.
lg.Life doesn’t get better by chance it get: Obulamu tebukyuka na mukisa wabula na nkyukakyuka
lg.There is no right time, just time, and w: Tewali budde butuufu, budde bwonna na kiki ky'osobola okubukozesa
lg.The enemy wouldn’t be attacking you so h: Omulabe yandibadde takulumbagana nnyo singa tobaddeemu kintu kya muwendo. Ababbi tebabba mu bifulukwa
lg.Delayed does not mean denied it just mea: Okulwawo tekitegeeza kulemererwa wabula kitegeeza nti olina okulindamu kko akabanga akawanvuko n'okukola ennyo.
lg.Most people who are criticizing and judg: Abantu abasinga abakolokota n'okulamula by'okoze tebannaba na kukola ky'olemereddwa.
lg.Your direction is more important then yo: Ekiruubirirwa kyo kya mugaso nnyo okusinga emisinde gyo
lg.There's a version of yourself that you h: Waliwo ggwe omulala gw'otannaba kusisinkana, genda mu maaso n'okukola okusinga mwembi lwe mulisisinkana.
lg.Are you doing what you told yourself you: Okola ekyo kye weegamba kye wali ogenda okukola?
lg.Can you fight off the old you long enoug: Osobola okulwanisa obukadde bwo osobole okufuna ggwe omuggya?
lg.It's impossible to stay at the same leve: Kizibu okusigala ku ddaala lye limu singa ogenda mu maaso n'okugezaako
lg.Remember that trying is 80% of doing som: Jjukira nti okugezaako kuli ku bintundu kinaana ku buli kikumi (80%). Noolwekyo gezaako, era towanika kubanga okuwanika kuli ku bintundu ebirala abiri ku buli kikumi (20%).
lg.Try something new! If you win you'll be: Gezaako ekintu ekipya! Singa owangula ojja kubeera musanyufu ate singa olemererwa ojja kubeera mugezi.
lg.Not every door that's closed is locked,: Si buli luggi oluzzeewo nti luggale, lusindike lweggule.
lg.How you do one thing is how you do every: Engeri gy'okolamu ekintu ekimu gy'okolamu buli kintu
lg.Sometimes we are so focused on the futur: Ebiseera ebimu essira tuliteeka ku biseera by'omu maaso bye tutalaba ne tulemwa okulaba nti leero bye biseera by'omu maaso bye twasabirira edda okumala emyaka.
lg.The move that you're afraid to make coul: Ekintu ky'otya okukola kiyinza okubeera nga kye kigenda okukyusa obulamu bwo.
lg.Just keep showing up when most people qu: Genda bugenzi mu maaso abantu abasinga bwe balemererwa.
Buli lunaku oyingira olutabaalo olupya: Ggwe ku ggwe. Teweerabira nti bulijjo oli muwanguzi.
lg.Happiness comes from solving your proble: Essanyu liva mu kugonjoola bizibu sso si mu kubyewala.
lg.If you can't do the small things right n: Bw'oba tosobola kukola bintu bitono mu kaseera kano… osuubira okya okukola ebinene edda?
lg.Remember if you are stressing it’s becau: Jjukira nti bw'obeera ogezaako, kibeera nti obeera tonnawanika.
lg.Stop worrying you'll figure it out like: Lekera awo okweraliikirira, ojja kukikola nga bwe wakikolanga edda.
lg.Life is like a bicycle. To keep your bal: Obulamu bulinga ggaali. Olina okubeera nga weetengerera, olina okusigala ng'ogenda mu maaso.
Omukisa? Nedda osobola okukola omukisa gwo.
lg.Motivation is what gets you started habi: Obuvumu bwe bukuyamba okutandika olwo empisa ne zikuyamba okugenda mu maaso.
lg.Don't limit your challenges, challenge y: Tokoma ku bisoomoozo byo, ebisoomoozo bye bijja okkukomako.
lg.Don't be the one thing standing in your: Tobeera muziziko oguyimiridde mu kkubo lyo.
lg.Sometimes things don't go your way or as: Ebiseera ebimu ebintu tebitambula nga bw'obyagala oba nga bwe wabiteekateeka. Ebintu biyinza okukyuka, okusazibwamu, oba okukuzza emabega. Kola kyonna ky'osobola okuddamu okutandika, naye tandika.
lg.Strive for progress, not perfection: Fuba nnyo okugenda mu maaso, si obutabaako kamogo
lg.The most important skill in life is lear: Akakodyo akasinga obulungi mu bulamu kwe kuyiga okukola ebintu ng'owulira toyagala kubikola. Omuntu yenna asobola okukikola bwe kiba kyangu abantu abamu batendewalira mu kaseera ebintu bwe bizibuwalira.
lg.Every overnight success has been years i: Buli buwanguzi bw'ofuna mu kiro bubanga obutuukiddwako oluvannyuma lw'emyaka.
lg.Sometimes when you're in a dark place yo: Ebiseera ebimu bw'obeera mu kizikiza olowooza nti obeera oziikiddwa, naye ekituufu kiri nti obeera oziikiddwa.
lg.“Dream”, counsels the visionary; “toil”,: Ekirooto", kiyambako okulabira ewala; "okulafuubana", kuyambako abakola, naye olina okukola byombi.
lg.Even in the depths of despondence, a day: Ne bw'obeera nga tolina ssuubi yadde, olunaku lw'omala lukuwa essomo. Beerawo ozuule ebirala!
lg.Whatever Life gives you, even if it hurt: Kyonna obulamu kye bukuleetera, ne bwe kiba kikunyiga, beera bubeezi mugumu era obeere nga atalina kizibu. Ebisenge ebigumu binyeenya naye tebimenyeka.
lg.Life is a circle of happiness, sadness,: Obulamu nkulungo ya ssanyu, ennaku, n'ebiseera ebirungi. Bw'obeera ng'oyita mu kiseera ekizibu, beera n'okukkiriza nri ebiseera ebirungi bijja.
lg.Every struggle in your life has shaped y: Buli kulafuubana kw'oyiseemu mu bulamu kukuteeseteese okufuuka ekyo ky'oli leero, noolwekyo beera musiimu eri ebiseera ebizibu, byongera bwongezi kukugumya.
lg.Don’t give up, the beginning is always t: Toggwaamu maanyi, bulijjo entandikwa y'esinga obuzibu
lg.Good things come to those who believe, B: Ebirungi bijja eri abo abalina okukkiriza, ebirungiko bijja eri abagumiikiriza. Ebirungi ennyo bijja eri abo abatawanika.
lg.Your first thought in the morning should: Ekirowoozo kyo ekirina okusooka kumakya kirina kuba "weebale
lg.Those who have a ‘why’ to live, can bear: Abo abalina "lwaki" balamu, basobola okugumira kumpi na buli kintu kyonna "butya"- Viktor E. Frankl
Omuddo gwongera okufuuka ogwa kiragala w'ogufukirira." Neil Barringham.
lg.Live to inspire, and one day people will: Baawo ng'ekyokulabirako eri abalala era olunaku lumu abantu bajja kugamba, olw'okuba ggwe, ssaawanika.
lg.Sometimes, when we are upset, we talk to: Ebiseera ebimu bwe tubeera nga tukyankalanye, twogera n'abantu abalala ku bizibu byaffe okufuna amagezi n'obuyambi.
lg.But other times it is helpful to listen: Naye mu biseera ebirala kiyamba nnyo okuwuliriza n'okuyamba abalala. Bwe tuteeka amaanyi gaffe ku kulowooza ku kirala, kiyamba bwongo bwaffe okutereera.
lg.To do this, one makes an effort to give: Okukola kino, omuntu omu afuba okuwa okusinga okutwala, awuliriza okusinga okwogera, awa endowooza ennungi okusinga embi, aleeta essanyu okusinga okwemulugunya.
lg.It is an exercise that can impact our ow: Bikolwa byaffe bye bisobola okukyusa embeera zaffe awamu n'ezabo abatwetoolodde.
